text: DXMA (104.1 FM), broadcasting as Wow Radio 104.1, is an FM station owned and operated by Polytechnic Foundation of Cotabato and Asia. The station's studio is located along Sto. Niño St., Brgy. Poblacion 1, Midsayap.Man accused of harassing radioman apologizes4 mamamahayag naghain din ng COC sa North Cotabato Last August 7, 2013, a blast occurred near the building where the station is located.New blasts rock MindanaoAnother blast hits MindanaoNorth Cotabato blast could have been devastating – affected property ownerRadio Station sa Midasayap North Cotabato, target nang pambobomba? ==References== Category:Radio stations in North Cotabato Category:Radio stations established in 2003
title: DXMA (Midsayap)
